CreateFileSystem.description: This operation creates a new, encrypted file system with automatic backups enabled, and the default generalpurpose performance mode.
CreateFileSystem.title: To create a new file system

CreateMountTarget.description: This operation creates a new mount target for an EFS file system.
CreateMountTarget.title: To create a new mount target

CreateTags.description: This operation creates a new tag for an EFS file system.
CreateTags.title: To create a new tag

DeleteFileSystem.description: This operation deletes an EFS file system.
DeleteFileSystem.title: To delete a file system

DeleteMountTarget.description: This operation deletes a mount target.
DeleteMountTarget.title: To delete a mount target

DeleteTags.description: This operation deletes tags for an EFS file system.
DeleteTags.title: To delete tags for an EFS file system

DescribeFileSystems.description: This operation describes all of the EFS file systems in an account.
DescribeFileSystems.title: To describe an EFS file system

DescribeLifecycleConfiguration.description: This operation describes a file system's LifecycleConfiguration. EFS lifecycle management uses the LifecycleConfiguration object to identify which files to move to the EFS Infrequent Access (IA) storage class.
DescribeLifecycleConfiguration.title: To describe the lifecycle configuration for a file system

DescribeMountTargetSecurityGroups.description: This operation describes all of the security groups for a file system's mount target.
DescribeMountTargetSecurityGroups.title: To describe the security groups for a mount target

DescribeMountTargets.description: This operation describes all of a file system's mount targets.
DescribeMountTargets.title: To describe the mount targets for a file system

DescribeTags.description: This operation describes all of a file system's tags.
DescribeTags.title: To describe the tags for a file system

ModifyMountTargetSecurityGroups.description: This operation modifies the security groups associated with a mount target for a file system.
ModifyMountTargetSecurityGroups.title: To modify the security groups associated with a mount target for a file system

PutLifecycleConfiguration.description: This operation enables lifecycle management on a file system by creating a new LifecycleConfiguration object. A LifecycleConfiguration object defines when files in an Amazon EFS file system are automatically transitioned to the lower-cost EFS Infrequent Access (IA) storage class. A LifecycleConfiguration applies to all files in a file system.
PutLifecycleConfiguration.title: Creates a new lifecycleconfiguration object for a file system
